thread.section_title: Larson Tax Relief Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Larson Tax Relief | www.larsontaxrelief.com
thread.title: Kenneth J
thread.title_full: Larson Tax Relief reviewed by Kenneth J

author: Kenneth J
title: Kenneth J
text:
Larson was brought to my attention by my assistant and her description to me after reaching out to several firms was simple "They were the only ones who provided information instead of a sales pitch." On the strength of that, I contacted them and spoke with Lucas H. It was the right choice.
The price was good, and the people were communicative and helpful. They set expectations correctly, and I never got the feeling that they were just going through the motions to handle me by checklist as one of thousands of clients. The pro-active communication is awesome, and I never wonder what's going on, I KNOW what is going on.
Everyone on my team (and I love being able to say "my team") has been professional and polite. I would like to give special thanks to Emily R. and Jennifer H. for staying with my case through the whole thing.
Ken
